\documentclass[tikz]{standalone}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\pgfplotsset{compat=1.11}
\pgfdeclareplotmark{al}{
    \node at (-4.2,-4.2,-4.2) {\includegraphics[width=0.5em]{aluminium}};
}
\pgfdeclareplotmark{ox}{
    \node at (-4.2,-4.2,-4.2) {\includegraphics[width=0.5em]{oxygen}};
}
\definecolor{Set1-5-1}{RGB}{228,26,28} %Red
\definecolor{Set1-5-2}{RGB}{55,126,184} %Blue

\usepackage{amsmath}
\providecommand{\abs}[1]{\lvert#1\rvert}
\usepackage{mathspec}
\setromanfont[Numbers={Lining,Proportional}]{Minion Pro}
\setmathsfont(Digits,Latin,Greek)[Numbers={Lining,Proportional}]{Minion Pro}
\setmathrm{Minion Pro}

\usepackage{fix-cm}

\node[scale=0.8] at (10.9,0) {$E_{01} = 34.84$ THz}; %Btype, tension
